alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued December 16 at 1:31AM PST until December 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Stagnant conditions will have potential to trap pollutants near the ground with deteriorated air quality. * WHERE...Waterville, Inchelium, Wenatchee, Boulder Creek Road, Conconully, Disautel Pass, Methow, Republic, Sherman Pass, Stevens Pass, Okanogan, Mazama, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Chelan, Omak, Wauconda, Leavenworth, Holden Village, Brewster, Nespelem, Tonasket, Cashmere, Number 2 Canyon, Twisp, Plain, Oroville, Mansfield, Pangborn Airport, Winthrop, Loup Loup Pass, Badger Mountain Road, Stehekin, Bridgeport, Entiat, Chesaw Road, and Number 1 Canyon. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: Buildup of fine pollution particles can be harmful to those sensitive to air pollution including people with lung and heart problems, people with diabetes, children and the elderly.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
